doc.title: Not Without Me You Don't!
doc.plot: When Nikki is invited to a wedding she doesn't tell her mistress that the invitation included a guest. When Nikki begins to active furtively, her mistress suspects she's hiding something, so she binds the impudent blonde and searches her belongings until she finds the invitation. Angered, Mistress Nichole begins a regimen of strict bondage in order to remind her lovely charge that lying will not be tolerated.
